title: Font Management
content: Hi all. I was wondering if anyone can help me. I've started to buy a lot of fonts and my collection is getting a bit much. Can you someone suggest a good font managment tool/software? Any suggestions will be greatly appreciated.
author: tammi

comments.content:
Call me old-fashioned or behind the times but I love ATM Deluxe... then again, horrors, I didn't have any form of font management up until a couple of months ago.   
   
I'm an idiot in terms of technology and find it easy to play with, ahem, I mean, use.
